com.heaton.bot
Class Link

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.heaton.bot.Link
public class Link
extends java.lang.Object

Very simple data class to hold HTML links. This class holds both the actual link URL, as well as the ALT tag. Copyright 2001 by Jeff Heaton

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jeff Heaton
